courseTitle: Learn C Programming: From Basics to Advanced
courseDescription: Master the basics of C programming including variables, control structures, and functions.

modules.moduleDescription: Learn the history, setup, and basics of C programming.

topics.topicContent: C is a powerful general-purpose programming language developed in the early 1970s.
Install GCC compiler and an IDE or use a command-line compiler.

modules.moduleDescription: Understand variables, data types, input/output, and operators.

topics.topicContent: Learn about int, float, char, and how to declare variables.
Using printf() and scanf() to interact with users.

modules.moduleDescription: Learn how to control the flow of your program using conditions and loops.

topics.topicContent: Execute code blocks based on conditions.
